job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pClient QualcommppLocation San Diego CAppbrppstrongJob OverviewstrongppWorlds largest supplier of 3G4G5G chipsets and software technologies and provides strategic advantage to wireless device manufacturers by delivering world class mobile wireless solutions and engineering support The Modem Software organization is currently seeking innovative and highly motivated engineering professionals to join our modem software integration and test team Engineers on this team are responsible for integrating testing and releasing to our customers our broad range of wireless modem software components as a cohesive software subsystem that is a central part of the overall software solution for all of our chipset products Responsibilities Integration of modem software subsystems such as 5G4G3G2G air interfaces RF Data services Drivers and generation of software builds for the modem processor Investigation of build failures and root cause analyses using build logs and code inspection Sanity testing of software builds and validation of bug fixes on mobile device prototypes in lab Initial ontarget debug log analysis and classification of failures and reporting of issues Collaboration with software development teams in order to find and fix software bugs Development of test scripts to verify new modem software features and enhance testing coverage Release of software to customers using version control tools and internal toolspp ppstrongRequirementsstrongppBachelors degree in Engineering Information Systems Computer Science or related fieldppExperience in embedded software development integration or testingppExperience in one or more programming languages  C C or PythonppExperience in embedded software ondevice testing and debugging toolsppExperience in 3G4G5G wireless technologies in a software development integration or testingdebugging roleppExperience in test execution using lab test equipment troubleshooting device  software issues analyzing logs and isolating failuresppExperience in Software Configuration Management tools such as PerforceppExperience in Scripting languages such as Perl or PythonppExperience in continuous software integration and software test automation toolsp
